frontpagetext: The second health atlas on day surgery describes the development in scope and variation between the health trusts' admission areas for the same twelve procedures as in the first day surgery atlas, this time for the period 2013–2017.
ingress: The fact sheets provide a brief description of the conditions and procedures, as well as information about the population’s use of the procedures in geographical areas. By use is meant the proportion of the population who undergo the procedure in question. The population’s use is measured as the number of procedures per 100.000 population. The fact sheets also include brief comments on differences in use between geographical areas.

innhold.tekst: More results and analyzes can be found in the [report](/helseatlas/files/daysurgery_2013-2017.pdf).

- [Shoulder](/helseatlas/files/daysurgery2_shoulder.pdf)
- [Menisci](/helseatlas/files/daysurgery2_menisci.pdf)
- [Hallux valgus and hammer toe](/helseatlas/files/daysurgery2_hammertoe.pdf)
- [Hand surgery](/helseatlas/files/daysurgery2_handsurgery.pdf)
- [Carpal tunnel syndrome](/helseatlas/files/daysurgery2_carpal.pdf)
- [Tonsillectomy](/helseatlas/files/daysurgery2_tonsillectomy.pdf)
- [Aural ventilation tube](/helseatlas/files/daysurgery2_auralventilation.pdf)
- [Cataract](/helseatlas/files/daysurgery2_cataracts.pdf)
- [Droopy eyelids](/helseatlas/files/daysurgery2_droopyeyelids.pdf)
- [Inguinal hernia](/helseatlas/files/daysurgery2_inguinalhernia.pdf)
- [Varicose](/helseatlas/files/daysurgery2_varicoseveins.pdf)

**Read more:** more results and analyzes can be found in the [report](/helseatlas/files/daysurgery_2013-2017.pdf).
